item.title: Ship your app to the World: Share it through apt
item.description: Tired of telling people to download .deb files? Learn how to package your app, upload it to Launchpad, and let anyone install it with just apt install.

item.title: GitOps with ArgoCD: Push Code, Sync and Take a Coffee
item.description: How to control your whole Kubernetes life with ArgoCD and ApplicationSet

item.title: Docker Containers: What the heck is really going on under the hood?
item.description: Ever wondered what happens when you run a Docker container? Let’s dive into the Linux magic behind namespaces, cgroups, and overlay filesystems that make it all possible.
